User story text: As a user, I can search for items, so that I can find products
As a user, I can search for items by keywords, so that I can find products
As a user, I can browse items freely so that I can find products
As a user, I can print search results so that I can keep a record of my search
Purpose: keep a record of my search

User story text: As a registered user, I can access my profile so that I can review my personal data.
As a registered user, I can log in to the system with my login and password, so that I can access privileged functionalities
Functionality: log in to the system with my login and password

User story text: As a registered user, I can log in to the system on a smartphone with my fingerprint, so that I can access privileged functionalities
Functionality: log in to the system on a smartphone with my fingerprint

User story text: As a user, I can register and create a profile, so that I can have privileges
As an admin, I can  validate a registration, so that I can control registered users
As a registered user, I can reset my password, so that I can add more security or recover my password
Purpose: add more security or recover my password
